title: Looking for 3 1910 Contentnea Charlotte T209 cards
author: BrettHoneycutt

posts.post_title: Looking for 3 1910 Contentnea Charlotte T209 cards
posts.post_content:
Looking for just three (3) of the 1910 Contentnea Charlotte T209 cards. 

I have 10 of the 13 Charlotte Hornets cards and just need the following to complete the team set:

-- Brazell (spelled Brazelle on card)
-- Cross
-- Francisco (spelled Francis on card)

Will take in an condition. 

Any help is greatly appreciated.

Thank you,

Brett

Just a quick thank you to Brian for helping me with the Francisco (Francis) card. Now I just need 2 to complete the 1910 Charlotte Contentnea T209:

-- Brazell (spelled Brazelle on card)
-- Cross

*If anyone has these, I would love to get them to complete the set (any condition).
